title: Mary Kom's Reply To Nikhat Zareen's Trial Bout Demand - I'm Not Scared Of Her, It's Only A Formality
text:
Mary Kom's Reply To Nikhat Zareen's Trial Bout Demand - I'm Not Scared Of Her, It's Only A Formality

Mary Kom's Reply To Nikhat Zareen's Trial Bout Demand - I'm Not Scared Of Her, It's Only A Formality

"I am not scared to face Nikhat Zareen," is MC Mary Kom's reply to the trial bout request. She added that beating her would just be formality.

Mary was the centre of attention after Zareen demanded a trial bout before the squad for the Olympic qualifiers is announced.

The BFI said it planned to pick Mary for the event after she won bronze at the World Championships.

afp

"The decision has been taken by BFI. I can't change the rule. I can just perform. Whatever they decide, I will go with that. I'm not scared to face her, I am fine with the trials," said Mary.

"I have defeated her many times since SAF Games but she keeps challenging me. I mean, what is the point? It is just a formality. BFI also knows who can win a medal at Olympics," she added.

"It has happened with me in the past also. Perform on the ring, that is the real thing. BFI sends us for exposure trips so comeback with a gold, prove yourself," she went on to say.

"I am not against her. She might be good in future, let her have the experience and focus on preparation for the highest level. I have been fighting for last 20 years. To challenge is easy but to perform is difficult."

afp

So what will happen now? Let's wait and watch.

With Inputs From PTI.
